title: CDS Annotation
text:
To ensure consistency of single-copy orthologue analyses (so that analysis results are not confounded with choice of annotation/gene-calling tool) all genomes in assets/analysis/2021-06-19_ANIm/bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes except for the lower-quality initial assemblies of LM19B, LM19R, LM41A and LM42D had CDS called by prodigal v2.6.3, using the assets/analysis/01-call_cds.sh script:
bash call_cds.sh

title: CDS Annotation
text:
To ensure consistency of single-copy orthologue analyses (so that analysis results are not confounded with choice of annotation/gene-calling tool) all genomes in assets/analysis/2021-06-19_ANIm/bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes except for the lower-quality initial assemblies of LM19B, LM19R, LM41A and LM42D had CDS called by prodigal v2.6.3, using the assets/analysis/01-call_cds.sh script:
bash call_cds.sh

title: CDS Annotation
text:
2 Output
Output can be found in the repository subdirectory assets/analysis/2021-06-22_CDS under three directories:

cds: the CDS on the genome (FASTA)
proteins: the conceptual translations of those CDS (FASTA)
gbk: annotated genome files (GenBank)

title: Phage Prediction
text: Frederik Boulund’s phaster.py script was used to submit each genome to the PHASTER server (2021-09-06) for annotation.

text: Frederik Boulund’s phaster.py script was used to submit each genome to the PHASTER server (2021-09-06) for annotation.

text:
2 Output
The returned output can be found in the repository subdirectory assets/analysis/2021-09-06_phaster.

title: Orthologue Finding
text:
Orthologue finding was carried out on the protein sequences predicted by prodigal in the directory /assets/analysis/2021-06-22_CDS/proteins using orthofinder v2.5.2. This was run on a CLIMB-MRC server with the command:
orthofinder -t 8 -a 8 -f 2021-06-22_CDS/proteins/ -o 2021-07-07_orthofinder
NOTE: this analysis was not conducted on the Nanopore-only assembly annotations, as their CDS were suspected to be of low quality.

title: Orthologue Finding
text:

NOTE: this analysis was not conducted on the Nanopore-only assembly annotations, as their CDS were suspected to be of low quality.

title: Orthologue Finding
text:
2 Output
Output is placed in the subdirectory /assets/analysis/2021-07-07_OrthoFinder under the following directories:

Single_Copy_Orthologue_Sequences: contains 974 multiple sequence (protein) FASTA files containing predicted single-copy orthologues from the 70-genome set of annotated proteins
Species_Tree: the species tree built by orthofinder and used for identification of orthologues.

title: Supplementary Information for Kamat et al.
text: Welcome to the supplementary information repository for “Genomic diversity of mammalian gut microbiome derived Lachnospiraceae associated with the microbiome-gut-brain axis”, by Kamat et al.

title: Supplementary Information for Kamat et al.
text: Welcome to the supplementary information repository for “Genomic diversity of mammalian gut microbiome derived Lachnospiraceae associated with the microbiome-gut-brain axis”, by Kamat et al.

title: Supplementary Information for Kamat et al.
text:
How to use the repository
The GitHub repository associated with this page contains supporting data for the Kamat et al. paper “Genomic diversity of mammalian gut microbiome derived Lachnospiraceae associated with the microbiome-gut-brain axis.” It also provides scripts used to generate the supporting data.
To clone the repository to your own machine using git, issue the command:
git clone git@github.com:widdowquinn/SI_Kamat_et_al_Clostridium_diversity
All data and analyses can be found in the assets/analysis subdirectory.

title: Orthologue Finding
text:

orthofinder -t 8 -a 8 -f 2021-06-22_CDS/proteins/ -o 2021-07-07_orthofinder
NOTE: this analysis was not conducted on the Nanopore-only assembly annotations, as their CDS were suspected to be of low quality.

title: Pangenome Analysis
text:
All genomes were reannotated with prokka using the script 03-prokka.snakefile, and subdivided into groups by species, as determined by ANIm analysis, in the subdirectory assets/analysis/2021-08-19_split_genomes, using the script split_species.py.
These genomes were then analysed by roary v3.12.0 using the script 04-roary.sh.

text:

title: Pangenome Analysis
text:
All genomes were reannotated with prokka using the script 03-prokka.snakefile, and subdivided into groups by species, as determined by ANIm analysis, in the subdirectory assets/analysis/2021-08-19_split_genomes, using the script split_species.py.
These genomes were then analysed by roary v3.12.0 using the script 04-roary.sh.

title: ANIm analysis
text:
The Average Nucleotide Identity (ANIm) analysis can be found in the assets/analysis/2021-06-19_ANIm repository subdirectory.
ANIm was conducted using pyani v0.3.0 with the commands:
pyani createdb -v -l pyani_logs/00-createdb.log
pyani index -v -l 01-index.log \
  bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes \
  --labels labels.txt \
  --classes classes.txt
pyani anim --debug -l 02-anim.log \
  -i bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes \
  -o anim_out \
  --scheduler SLURM \
  --labels bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/labels.txt \
  --classes bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/classes.txt
pyani plot -v -l 03-plot.log \
  anim_plots 1 \
  --formats png,pdf

# hybrid assembly genomes added; labels/classes files updated manually
# in new_labels.txt, new_classes.txt

pyani anim --debug -l 04-anim_hybrid.log \
  -i bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes \
  -o anim_out_hybrid \
  --scheduler SLURM \
  --labels bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/new_labels.txt \
  --classes bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/new_classes.txt
pyani plot -v -l 03-plot.log \
  anim_plots_hybrid 3 \
  --formats png,pdf

title: ANIm analysis
text:
The Average Nucleotide Identity (ANIm) analysis can be found in the assets/analysis/2021-06-19_ANIm repository subdirectory.
ANIm was conducted using pyani v0.3.0 with the commands:
pyani createdb -v -l pyani_logs/00-createdb.log
pyani index -v -l 01-index.log \
  bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes \
  --labels labels.txt \
  --classes classes.txt
pyani anim --debug -l 02-anim.log \
  -i bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes \
  -o anim_out \
  --scheduler SLURM \
  --labels bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/labels.txt \
  --classes bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/classes.txt
pyani plot -v -l 03-plot.log \
  anim_plots 1 \
  --formats png,pdf

# hybrid assembly genomes added; labels/classes files updated manually
# in new_labels.txt, new_classes.txt

pyani anim --debug -l 04-anim_hybrid.log \
  -i bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes \
  -o anim_out_hybrid \
  --scheduler SLURM \
  --labels bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/new_labels.txt \
  --classes bolteae_clostridioforme_symbiosum_genomes/new_classes.txt
pyani plot -v -l 03-plot.log \
  anim_plots_hybrid 3 \
  --formats png,pdf

title: ANIm analysis
text:
2 Output
The analysis files, including input genomes, are in the repository subdirectory assets/analysis/2021-06-19_ANIm.
The pyani database is in the file 2021-06-19_ANIm/pyanidb/pyanidb. Graphical output is in the directories 2021-06-19_ANIm/anim_plots and 2021-06-19_ANIm/anim_plots_hybrid. Log files cataloguing the analysis are in the 2021-06-19_ANIm/*.log files.
